description._content: Image Description from historic lecture booklet: "Today part of the water on the American side of Niagara Falls, and part on the Canadian side, is taken off through great tubes or tunnels and made to turn huge wheels. In the power plants these wheels. In the power plants these wheels are connected with dynamos so that electrical energy is generated. This energy is not only used near at hand, but sold to consumers many miles away." Original Collection: Visual Instruction Department Lantern Slides Item Number: P217:set 020 011 You can find this image by searching for the item number by clicking here. Want more?
